channel.title: Help with find bank script
channel.description:
How to use the FindBank procedure i only get this error when i try the code like this : FindBank(TheBank: string): Boolean; this is the error given: Line 25: [Error] (14338:14): Unknown identifier 'TheBank' in script C:\Documents and Settings\Meanz\Skrivebord\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\MeanzPowerCutter.scar
any1 help Tongue

item.title: Help with find bank script
item.description:
@1337 wrote:

lol you’re not meant to put “TheBank: String” or :Boolean…
Read up on functions, take a look around the tut section for that tutorial .exe file, it’s got a good bit about functions.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with find bank script
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

umm… im pretty sure you need to specify what bank your at

FindBank(‘Varrock’); or something like that. When you need info on an SRL procedure, open up the section of SRL the procedure is in and read the notes.

Read full topic
